com.google.android.exoplayer.text

Class SubtitleParserHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.text.SubtitleParserHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler.Callback

    public class SubtitleParserHelper
extends Object
implements Handler.Callback
    Wraps a SubtitleParser, exposing an interface similar to MediaCodec for asynchronous parsing of subtitles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SubtitleParserHelper(Looper looper, SubtitleParser parser)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubtitleParserHelper

        public SubtitleParserHelper(Looper looper,
                    SubtitleParser parser)
        Parameters:
        looper - The Looper associated with the thread on which parsing should occur.
        parser - The parser that should be used to parse the raw data.

    • Method Detail

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Flushes the helper, canceling the current parsing operation, if there is one.

      • isParsing

        public boolean isParsing()
        Whether the helper is currently performing a parsing operation.
        Returns:
        True if the helper is currently performing a parsing operation. False otherwise.

      • getSampleHolder

        public SampleHolder getSampleHolder()
        Gets the holder that should be populated with data to be parsed.

        The returned holder will remain valid unless flush() is called. If flush() is called the holder is replaced, and this method should be called again to obtain the new holder.

        Returns:
        The holder that should be populated with data to be parsed.

      • startParseOperation

        public void startParseOperation()
        Start a parsing operation.

        The holder returned by getSampleHolder() should be populated with the data to be parsed prior to calling this method.

      • getAndClearResult

        public Subtitle getAndClearResult()
                           throws IOException
        Gets the result of the most recent parsing operation.

        The result is cleared as a result of calling this method, and so subsequent calls will return null until a subsequent parsing operation has finished.

        Returns:
        The result of the parsing operation, or null.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the parsing operation failed.

      • handleMessage

        public boolean handleMessage(Message msg)
        Specified by:
        handleMessage in interface Handler.Callback
